mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_device(user_phone,device_num,create_time,update_time,expiry_date) VALUES (#{userPhone}, #{deviceNum},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{expiryDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_device where device_num = #{deviceNum}
mapper.delete: delete from user_device where device_num = #{deviceNum} and user_phone = #{userPhone}
